head.supplied: Monday 4/5/63 ¶ Dear and beloved Effie. ¶ ¶ The weather being favorable, I think I can manage to spare the afternoon to morrow (Tuesday) for planting more pines. So if you feel a pleasure to come ove...

div.p: RB MSS M41, Library, Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.

The weather being favorable, I think I can manage to spare the afternoon to morrow (Tuesday) for planting more pines. So if you feel a pleasure to come over to the bot Museum & afterwards to accompany to the areas to be planted, I shall feel very happy, & will escort you home in the evening. Pray let this however not disarrange any other engagements you may have made for that afternoon.
